name: cc-globals
description: Setup global variables for ramda and fetch

scripts.publish-major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish && git push origin master && git push --tags
scripts.publish-minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish && git push origin master && git push --tags
scripts.publish-patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish && git push origin master && git push --tags

author: Michael J. Ryan <tracker1@gmail.com>
